pageProduct.name: Aveeno Active Naturals Stress Relief Moisturising Lotion Lavender, Chamomile and Ylang-Ylang Essences 354mL
pageProduct.description:
Information

A stress relief body wash with natural colloidal oatmeal, lavendar, chamomile and ylang-ylang oils which helps to calm and relax while providing 24hour moistursing.

General Information

AVEENO® Stress Relief Moisturising Lotion 354mL

Aveeno Stress Relief Moisturising Lotion helps improve your well-being by calming and relaxing you, while providing long-lasting moisturisation. This unique moisturiser helps to calm and relax you as you massage it into your skin, while moisturising to leave skin soft and smooth. Aveeno combines the calming essence of lavender and essential chamomile and ylang-ylang oils with the soothing properties of natural colloidal oatmeal - long known to hold in moisture.


  • Moisturising cream for dry skin

  • Contains lavender, chamomile and ylang-ylang essances to help relieve stress

  • Clinically proven to moisturise for 24 hours

  • Non greasy moisturiser formula is fast absorbing

  • Natural colloidal oatmeal blended with emollients



Discover Aveeno Active Naturals. Simply put, Active Naturals are ingredients derived from nature and uniquely formulated to reveal skin's natural health and beauty.

Size: 354mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Moisturises for 24 Hours
• Calms and Relaxes
• Colloidal Oatmeal
• Lavender, Chamomile & Ylang Ylang Essences




Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Distearyldimonium Chloride, , Petrolatum, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, colloidal oatmeal, benzyl alcohol, sodium chloride- (F#10098-62)

Directions

Massage AVEENO Stress Relief Moisturising Lotion on after bathing, before bed or anytime you want to relax.
